Text: Back in 2017, he worked for Monarch Airlines, and was among an estimated 2,100 employees who suddenly found themselves out of work after the airline went into administration.
Effect: Back in 2017, he worked for Monarch Airlines, and was among an estimated 2,100 employees who suddenly found themselves out of work
Sentence: <e2>Back in 2017, he worked for Monarch Airlines, and was among an estimated 2,100 employees who suddenly found themselves out of work</e2> after <e1>the airline went into administration.</e1>
